text: Hi everyone. Will Smith (no, not that one). All about me ---> <https://www.linkedin.com/in/will-smith-b079bb16b/> I'm making my way through the HubSpot certifications. I'm always up for learning more about HubSpot, even though I don't have a ton of experience in the coding world. . . so please be kind. Thanks!

Hello I am Kumar Mangala  All about me ---> <https://www.linkedin.com/in/kumarmangala/>  I am new to HubSpot.  Zero experience with coding. I have been a recruiter all my life  . . I am expecting to learn from all of you here. <@U22PKFRU5> thank you for the Invite.
